fields.summary: iOS 7: Items liked with Ti.UI.AUTOLINK_ALL do not open when clicked upon

comments.body:
Closing ticket as fixed. Verified that I was able to launch the mobile Safari browser after pressing on the url link. Also, was able to verify pressing the phone number link will try to make a phone call.

Tested on:

Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.2.1.201401151647
SDK build: 3.2.1.v20140117222448, 3.3.0.v20140117222449 
CLI: 3.2.1 (git://github.com/appcelerator/titanium.git#3_2_X)
Xcode: 5.0.2
Devices: iphone 5 (6.1.3), iphone 5 (7.0.2), iphone simulator (6.1), iphone simulator (7.0.3)
